name: LD36 - Da Vinci vs Ancient Creators
name_original: LD36 - Da Vinci vs Ancient Creators
description: In the year 2560 BC the ancient Egyptians raised the great pyramids of Giza, but how did they do that? What ancestral technology did they used to achieve success? This question has turned crazy scientists for years, but not anymore. 4070 years later the true creators have returned to claim their works, and only one of the brightest minds of today may save us!
